title: Opportunities to meet - Bioforce
content: En Fr Bioforce News Recruitment Log in bioforce learn trainings build missions share contributions learn OPPORTUNITIES TO MEET Come and talk to our teams So you can discover more about Bioforce, its courses and specific features, we organise open days throughout the year: every month, come along to the information meetings and once a year, the whole team is on hand to meet you during our Open Day. EVERY MONTH, WE HOLD INFORMATION MEETINGS IN EUROPE AND AFRICA A two-hour session to discover more about the centre, its courses and its specific features, to find out more about working in the humanitarian sector, but also to answer your questions about our selection criteria, how to fund your course, the individual support offered by careers advisers, accreditation of prior learning and more. These meetings are only in French, if you have questions in english, please, contact us by our registration form! Contact us EVERY YEAR, WE HOLD AN OPEN DAY IN EUROPE This day is a unique opportunity to straighten out your humanitarian career aspirations: understanding the sector, picking the right profession, finding the appropriate training course. To get an insight into the course content with technical demonstrations of the equipment used in the field. To talk to the trainers, students and alumni!
